paper.title: ON SAFETY, DOMAIN INDEPENDENCE, AND CAPTURABILITY OF DATABASE QUERIES* (Preliminary Report)

author.org: Department of Computer Science, SUNY at Stony Brook, Stony Brook, NY 11794, USA

paper.venue: Proceedings of the Third International Conference on Data and Knowledge Bases#R##N#Improving Usability and Responsiveness
paper.abstract: We study the relationship between domain independent and safe queries, showing that for some query classes these notions are the same, while for the others they are different. We also consider the question of when these properties can be decided and the corresponding query classes be evaluated (captured).
